author: Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen
title: Love lockdown: Danes snap up sex toys after being told to stay home
description: Sales of sex toys in Denmark have more than doubled after Danes were told to stay at home to limit the spread of the coronavirus, according to the country's biggest retailer of the merchandise.
content:
COPENHAGEN (Reuters) - Sales of sex toys in Denmark have more than doubled after Danes were told to stay at home to limit the spread of the coronavirus, according to the country’s biggest retailer of the merchandise.
